user.title: OneControl BLE Gateway
user.description:
Select your OneControl device.

**Before proceeding:**
- Make sure your OneControl unit is powered on
- You'll need the **6-digit PIN** from the sticker on your OneControl unit
- You'll need to press the **Connect button** on your RV monitor panel during setup

pairing_instructions.title: Prepare for Pairing
pairing_instructions.description:
Gateway: **{name}**

**‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Before continuing, you must put your OneControl device in pairing mode.**

**Step 1: Press the Connect Button**
1. Locate the **RV monitor panel** (the physical control panel in your RV)
2. Press and release the **Connect** button on the monitor panel
3. The device will enter pairing mode for 30-60 seconds
4. You'll see a visual indicator (LED) if your panel has one

**Step 2: Get Your PIN Ready**
- While the device is in pairing mode, locate the **6-digit PIN**
- The PIN is printed on a **sticker on your OneControl unit**
- It looks like: `090336` (6 digits, may have leading zeros)
- Have this PIN ready for the next step

**Step 3: Continue Setup**
- Click **Submit** below to continue
- You must complete the PIN entry within the 30-60 second pairing window
- If you run out of time, press the Connect button again and retry

**üí° Tip:** Have the PIN ready before clicking Submit to save time!

pin.title: Enter PIN
pin.description:
Gateway: **{name}**

**‚ö†Ô∏è The device should be in pairing mode** (Connect button pressed in previous step).

**Where to Find Your PIN:**
- Look for a **sticker on your OneControl unit** (the Unity X270D controller)
- The sticker contains a **6-digit numeric PIN**
- It may look like: `090336` or `123456`
- The PIN may have leading zeros (e.g., `090336` not `90336`)

**Enter the 6-digit PIN below:**

**‚è±Ô∏è Timing:** You have 30-60 seconds from when you pressed the Connect button. If pairing fails, press the Connect button again and retry the setup.
